name: EZAMED 500 TABLET
description: EZAMED 500 TABLET is used to treat mild to moderate susceptible infections caused by bacteria and other micro-organisms which includes chest, throat.

name: SBL's Ache-Nil Drops
description: SBL's Ache-Nil Drops Viruses are very tiny germs.Viruses cause familiar infectious diseases such as the common cold, flu and warts. Different viruses attack certain cells in your body such as your liver, respiratory system, or blood.Symtpoms vary from head to toes.

name: Roxid 50mg Liquid
description: Roxid 50mg Liquid is an antibiotic medicine. It is commonly given to children for the treatment of a wide range of bacterial infections such as infections of the ear, nose.

name: Macpod 50 Oral Suspension
description: Macpod 50 Oral Suspension is an antibiotic medicine. It is commonly given to children for the treatment of a wide range of bacterial infections targeting the ears, eyes, nose.

name: Kep LS Oral Drops
description: Kep LS Oral Drops comprises three active ingredients that together help treat wet cough (cough with mucus), acute sore throat and asthma in children
